required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Assesment of the Accuracy of Surgical Guide Designed From CBCT With Different Voxel Sizes
clinical_study.official_title: Assesment of the Accuracy of Surgical Guide Designed From CBCT With Different Voxel Size in Computer Guided Implantology Randomized Clinical Trial

brief_summary.textblock:
Accuracy Of CBCT affected by many factors. On of the most factors the affect the image quality is voxel size. Larger voxel size give a higher accuracy of the images but with higher radiation dose.
The study is to assist the accuracy of surgical guides designed from CBCT with different voxel sizes .

detailed_description.textblock:
Accuracy Of CBCT affected by many factors. On of the most factors the affect the image quality is voxel size. Larger voxel size give a higher accuracy of the images but with higher radiation dose.
The study is to assist the accuracy of surgical guides designed from CBCT with different voxel sizes (voxel size 0.4mm & 0.2mm)

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)
study_design_info.masking_description: Each patient will be given a code by researcher (M.H) and the observers will be blind to which group this case belong

primary_outcome.description: Evaluation of angular deviation of virtual implant and actual implant positions according to voxel size difference (0.2 mm versus 0.4 mm)
Evaluation of linear deviation of virtual implant and actual implant positions according to voxel size difference (0.2 mm versus 0.4 mm

clinical_study.condition: Accuracy of Surgical Guide in Implants

arm_group.arm_group_label: Surgical guide designed from voxel size 0.2mm
arm_group.description: Surgical guide will be designed based on CBCT voxel size 0.2mm

arm_group.arm_group_label: Surgical guide designed from voxel size 0.4m
arm_group.description: Surgical guide will be designed based on CBCT voxel size 0.4 mm

intervention.description: Surgical Guide for this group will designed from 0.4mm voxel size
intervention.arm_group_label: Surgical guide designed from voxel size 0.4m

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- partially edentulous patients seeking for dental implant
- Bucco-lingual width more than 6 mm
- Medically free patients
Exclusion Criteria:
- patients with thin ridges that may need augmentation
- patients with systematic diseases that may affect bone quality
- completely edentulous patients
- patients with limited mouth opening
